channel.title: No-IP
channel.description:
I have a No-IP adress and im not sure what i should do after. Im wondering: what i should do to make it a real server, how to get it to have all the commands, and how to make me the admin of it.
I would appreciate it if you only posted helpful comments instead of: Noob! like my last topic.
Thanks

item.title: No-IP
item.dc:creator: @Phat_Boi Phat Boi
item.description:
@Phat_Boi wrote:

For admin change your player rights to 3, but if you looked you can find tuts on all this so im not going to waste my time explaining it.

Read full topic
